description: Very good, though a mechanism for making alliances with AI players would be an improvement. There are a few bugs but the bug reporter doesn't seem to work. Also ideally there would only be one version available at once - 2 show up on the GUI software installer and I can't quite figure out which one is the main updated one.
summary: Good game, fun when you get the hang of it

description: Ist ein blödes Spiel ziemmlich langweilig.
